Mr. Rella brings more than 25 years of diversified financial and operational experience working with entrepreneurial companies; providing leadership in building processes and infrastructure to support rapid growth. Rella most recently was the CFO/COO of Suros Surgical Systems, Inc. where he helped grow the company from a start-up in 2002 to a $283 million strategic exit in 2006 that approximated 8 times trailing 12 month revenue and provided over a 6x return to shareholders.

From 1994 â€“ 2000, Mr. Rella was the CFO of Pictorial, Inc., a $30 million publisher and software development company where he helped take the Company to a strategic exit in 1997 and again in 2000 for over $120 million.. From 1990 -1994, Rella was the CFO of Shepard Poorman Communications Corporation, a printing and publishing company that grew from $17 â€“ 80 million in the same period. Prior, Mr. Rella was the managing partner of the Indianapolis office of Drees, Perugini and Company, a mid-market CPA firm with offices in Indianapolis and Ft. Wayne, Indiana.
